definition: to go on a scenic tour
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
surname You
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Long, long ago, there is a student who likes to travel.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，有个读书人喜欢游山玩水。

sentences.english: You may get the chance to travel both for work and for pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 你有出差的机会，同时也可以游山玩水。

sentences.english: He made the most of his spare time in Hawaii touring the scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 他利用在夏威夷的闲暇充分游山玩水。

sentences.english: The goal of pilgrimages is beyond sightseeing.
sentences.chinese: 朝圣的目的是超越一般的游山玩水。

sentences.english: Visiting places is really a good idea to keep fit.
sentences.chinese: 游山玩水的确是保持健康的好主意。

sentences.english: They are enjoying the selves at other places when we found this problem.
sentences.chinese: 当我们发现这个问题的时候，他们正在外地游山玩水。

definition: to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
to drive away cares/to relieve boredom
free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered/outside the reach of the law (of criminal)/at large
to tour/to travel
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
famous mountains and great rivers
to go on a tour/to have an outing
to play around/to disport oneself
lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
pleasure seeking (idiom); life of dissipation
to have money and time/to be part of the leisure class/the idle rich
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
to stroll
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
excursion/hike/march
